sentence: Arizona Republican State Representative Mark Finchem (District 11) is not a widely-known figure outside of the Grand Cayon State’s most intimate political cliques.
author: Brandon Gage
title: Donald Trump loyalist running for Arizona secretary of state is a right-wing plot to end democracy

sentence: He was endorsing Mark Finchem, a Republican lawmaker from Tucson, in his bid to become Arizona’s secretary of state.
author: Ed Pilkington
title: ‘This should terrify the nation’: the Trump ally seeking to run Arizona’s elections

sentence: "Since the 2020 election, Rep. Mark Finchem has alleged widespread voter fraud, arguing in part that too many mail-in ballots went to people not living at some Arizona addresses.
author: Bob Brigham
title: BUSTED: Trump-endorsed Secretary of State candidate does not live where he is registered to vote

sentence: State Rep. Mark Finchem, R-Oro Valley, raised questions as far back as 2019 about the wisdom of constructing hundreds of miles of new freeway when the state can’t take care of the roads it already has.
author: Howard Fischer Capitol Media Services
title: Environmentalists sue to stop Interstate 11 through Arizona
